name: 1.1 - Review of approved construction drawings and specifications
Conformance Criteria Summary - Approved IFC drawings and project specifications available on-site
Records or Checklist Document Number - IFC Drawings
1.2 - Site condition check and access preparation
Conformance Criteria Summary - Site cleared, accessible, and suitable for concrete slab works
1.3 - Site safety induction and toolbox talks
Conformance Criteria Summary - All personnel inducted and briefed on safety, site-specific risks
Records or Checklist Document Number - Site inductions records
1.4 - Inspection of plant and equipment (e.g., concrete pump, vibrators)
Conformance Criteria Summary - All equipment calibrated and operational
Records or Checklist Document Number - Calibration/Pre-start

Conformance Criteria Summary - Approved mix design
Records or Checklist Document Number - FIC
2.3 - Review of concrete mix design and material certificates
Conformance Criteria Summary - Approved mix design, material certificates compliant with AS 1379
Records or Checklist Document Number - Product certificate of compliance

Conformance Criteria Summary - Formwork in line with drawings, clean, and dimensionally correct

Conformance Criteria Summary - Correct bar size, spacing, reinforcement securely tied, adequate cover
Records or Checklist Document Number - IFC Drawings FIC
Conformance Criteria Summary - Membrane installed as per drawings/specs

Conformance Criteria Summary - Correct positioning of all embedded items per drawings

Conformance Criteria Summary - Batch delivery dockets match approved mix

Conformance Criteria Summary - Slump within specified range (e.g., 100mm +/- 20mm)

Conformance Criteria Summary - Concrete placed within formwork, no segregation, fully compacted

3.4 - Cylinder samples for compressive strength testing
Conformance Criteria Summary - Minimum of 12 cylinders in total for 7, 14, 28-day tests

Conformance Criteria Summary - Temperature within acceptable range

Conformance Criteria Summary - Concrete poured with a maximum free-fall height of 1.8m to avoid segregation

Conformance Criteria Summary - Concrete properly compacted with vibrators, no voids or segregation
Records or Checklist Document Number - FIC

Conformance Criteria Summary - Concrete curing per approved concrete curing method statement

Conformance Criteria Summary - Curing compound applied or wet curing in place

Conformance Criteria Summary - Formwork removed at required strength, surface defects repaired

Conformance Criteria Summary - Compressive strength >32 MPa at 28 days

Conformance Criteria Summary - Surface levels, dimensions, and finish within tolerances

Conformance Criteria Summary - Expansion and contraction joints installed per design drawings
